titleStmt.title: Reverend and beloved, it hath pleased the Right Honorable the Lord Major of the City of London, once and again to write unto the ministers thereof respectively, in a very pious and pathetical manner. ...
titleStmt.author: Seaman, Lazarus, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening words of text.
Imprint date from Thomason's Ms. note.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
